comment.author: 23025530@N06
comment._content: This photo probably from the 1911 international Challenge Cup polo tournament. Capt. Cheape a member of the English polo team. This article mentions him as a possible casualty in Dec 1915, probably action in Gallipoli (British Mediterranean forces). query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D05E6D8163BE6...

comment.author: 25246854@N05
comment._content: I love that the guy has a tattoo on his arm.

comment.author: 7129906@N03
comment._content: Un modo come un altro  (come me) di lasciare traccia di se stessi.

comment.author: 46317445@N00
comment._content: On Dec. 20, 1911, the Gettysburg Times reported that Captain Cheape had died from smallpox in Delhi: news.google.com/newspapers?nid=2202&dat=19111220&... Enigmatic, given his later demise at Gallipolli.

comment._content: Thank you Robert Arthur Norton and Wystan for the additional information on Leslie Cheape and for gathering the related images.  We will include some of the details when we next update.
